verses.verse: I was glad <S%H8055><s%> when they said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H3212><s%> "Let's go to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s house! <S%H1004><s%>"
Our feet <S%H7272><s%> are standing <S%H5975><s%> within your gates, <S%H8179><s%> Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%>
Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> that is built <S%H1129><s%> as a city <S%H5892><s%> that is compact <S%H2266><s%> together; <S%H3162><s%>

where <S%H8033><s%> the tribes <S%H7626><s%> go up, <S%H5927><s%> even Yah <S%H3050><s%>'s tribes, <S%H7626><s%> according to an ordinance <S%H5715><s%> for Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to give thanks <S%H3034><s%> to the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
For there are set <S%H3427><s%> thrones <S%H3678><s%> for judgment, <S%H4941><s%> the thrones <S%H3678><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%>
Pray <S%H7592><s%> for the peace <S%H7965><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> Those who love <S%H157><s%> you will prosper. <S%H7951><s%>
Peace <S%H7965><s%> be within your walls, <S%H2426><s%> and prosperity <S%H7962><s%> within your palaces. <S%H759><s%>
For my brothers <S%H251><s%>' and companions <S%H7453><s%>' sakes, <S%H1696><s%> I will now say, "Peace be within you. <S%H7965><s%>"
For the sake of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God, <S%H430><s%> I will seek <S%H1245><s%> your good. <S%H2896><s%>
